channel.title: Sale and Pledge Drive for All My Games
channel.description:
Hey folks!
[I've got a sale going on all my role-playing games on itch](https://itch.io/s/57278/35-damn-years-sale), as well as a pledge drive to get some attention on my Patreon and Ko-fi.
* All my games and supplements are 35%-off * You can get everything in one bundle for $35 * You can also get all my self-published work, as well as future prototypes and releases, for as little as $1 a month by [subscribing on Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/notwriting) or becoming a [member on Ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/notwriting)
If you're wondering where to start, some of my more popular titles are:
* [World Maker](https://notwriting.itch.io/world-maker): a solo game/tool for GM's to build a fictional world by addressing the traits and histories of characters * [Neon Black](https://notwriting.itch.io/neon-black): Cyberpunk forged in the dark game about communities helping each other and stealing from the rich * [A Torch in the Dark](https://notwriting.itch.io/a-torch-in-the-dark): Solo dungeon crawling game, forged in the dark, about robbing the tombs of undead nobles.
I'm a full-time freelance writer/designer so reliable income is pretty important, and I'm giving a helluva deal in exchange.
And if you're not in a spot where you can buy games or subscribe, but want to check my games out, they each have plenty of community copies thanks to the support I've already received.
If you have any questions, please let me know!
